attributes.action: Introduce the motorcycle CBT test as a prerequisite to applying for a car provisional licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would give potential car drivers an appreciation of the hazards faced by motorcyclists.  

Doing the motorcyle compulsory basic training (CBT) before you can apply for your car provisional licence would give the person some useful safety skills and also an understanding of what a motorcyclist is doing or will do and why.

This will help car drivers to become more motorcycle aware which will help to reduce road deaths and injuries.

The motorcycle CBT should be compulsory unless there is a medical reason that you cannot achieve it.
